document.full_text: italy wednesday deported a tunisian former inmate at the u.s. military prison in guantanamo bay, accusing him of being part of an extremist cell.
document.title: italy deports ex-guantanamo tunisian terror suspect
lines_and_colors: italy wednesday deported a tunisian former inmate at the u.s. military prison in guantanamo bay, accusing him of being part of an extremist cell.
